external_games.name: Rocksmith 2014 Edition – Remastered – U2 Song Pack

name: Rocksmith 2014 Edition: Remastered - U2: Song Pack
summary: Play "With or Without You", “Sunday Bloody Sunday”, “Where the Streets Have No Name”, “Beautiful Day” and "Vertigo" by U2 on any electric guitar or bass. Each song includes a new authentic tone.
